Rianna Davis.text:
I always leave feeling refreshed and ready.

        I have only made so much progress on my fitness journey because of Meredith.
The massage keeps my body ready for training. I always show up with knots in different muscles and by the end of the session they‚Äôre gone. After every massage Meredith assists with stretches that are difficult to do on your own, and you just leave feeling like you can take on anything.

        Not only does she keep me going but she has given me the best advice when it comes to nutrition, skin care and any question I have about my muscles, she always has the answer which has given me a better understanding of my body and how to prevent further injuries.

Mark Roberts.text:
I met Mirum Vita about 5 years ago when I was at a low in my physical prowess; overweight, sciatica, back issues, aching joints and more, due to the last 40 years of abusing my body with various martial arts, sword fights, physical training, and good living (Or bad depending how you look at it :) )

        I have seen several therapists over the years, none have managed to have such a profound restoration and revival on my physical stature and wellbeing.

        Mirum Vita is undoubtedly the best therapist I have had, her miraculous skills have re-sculpted me physically and mentally. Where I was achingly hobbling out of bed in the morning, I now leap up (and I mean literally leaping out of bed).

        I am also on my way to regaining my six pack (and I don‚Äôt mean beer). I cannot recommend Mirum Vita highly enough, she will make you feel NEW. Inside and out.

Valerie Sutherland.text: I had laser liposuction above my c section scar, as I had an overhang. This tightened all the muscles above and removed the excess skin. This took around 6 sessions and it looks totally natural like I‚Äôd been in a gym. This was non invasive and at the fraction of the cost of more advertised clinics. Would highly recommend this treatment.

Meiwan Maque.text: A lovely woman who does a great job. I heard about her from all the way in the US and made it a priority to visit. Was definitely not disappointed. Professional, knowledgeable and proficient. A+++

Maximas Von Bracey.text:
Been going for years, helped me with numerous injuries. I've been to physios and private health care, what is offered here is far superior üíû
        Plantar Fascia injury - cured. Golfers Elbow - cured. Sciatic issues - cured.

Will Barlow.text: Every single time I come thru London I make sure to book a session with this lovely woman. Fixes my combat damage and leaves me feeling amazing. 10/10 would recommend. Absolutely the best there is!

Matthew Bracey.text: Great physio, I had a bad back, neck and shoulder. She got me sorted within a couple of sessions. Great communication, very pleasant lady, easy to deal with and fair pricing. I would recommend to anyone and would only use Mirum.

Jessie Hagger.text: I go every week for my back message and it really helps. Removed all discomfort that I had before. From hot stones to back clicking, it is a really relaxing, pain relieving process. Every two weeks I have a facial which has really stopped the rate and the severity of my breakouts. Would definitely recommend both treatments for what you pay!

Wendy W Jackson.text: Oh wow!  MY RESCUE, my body is now aligned, i also feel 2 inches taller & 5 stone lighter (the mirror just lies lol) lovely lady explained my treatment & made sure i was totally comfortable throughout treatment at my home address, i had been locked up in back pain due to car crash & after i was free from pain & mobile, best money ive spent this lockdown!!  recommend recommend recommend!!!

Karis Denieffe-George.text:
I have been aware of Meredith‚Äôs craft and her existing clientele for many years. She often offered her help to me when I was at my lowest mentally and heaviest physically.

        I often suffered from bouts of depression, low self-esteem coupled with poor eating and drinking habits which then resulted in physical ailments such as joint pain, tendonitis, and other obesity related health issues.

        After five years of resistance, I finally gave in to my friends and family who recommended her services and I have never looked back. It isn‚Äôt just a session that ends when you leave the warm environment she sets up, there is ongoing support via text and calls when she is available. She is incredibly flexible with times and location (pre COVID of course).

        I have lost over 100lbs since starting with Meredith on a realistic lifestyle change (never hungry but just eating right coupled with exercise) and I can‚Äôt see it ending any time soon. My confidence and attitude to life is somewhere I never thought it could ever be and I see this as the beginning of a long and happy life.

        If you want a life to live, you can‚Äôt go wrong with using Meredith and her talent for transforming people‚Äôs lives.

Alan Sutherland.text: Where do I start ... Totally professional and amazing at what she does, great listener and motivator and I can‚Äôt even begin to tell you how wonderful she is at massages and my spine has been realigned many a time !!! Love this lady !!!

Jack Bennett.text: I have a very physical construction job and at the end of the week when I am suffering from aches and pains, Mel fixes my body as good as new. Highly recommended.

Sarah Sutherland.text: I came to see Meredith when I was at a real low point mentally and physically after trying various treatments at a variety of places. I had a hot stone massage which made a big difference to my general wellbeing. I would recommend Mirum Vita 100% - she doesn't just leave you when your appointment is over either she checks in, in a non invasive way and always without judgement! I honestly cannot thank her enough. x

Michael James Cole.text:
I have been to see Mel for years now fixing up all the injuries from both the fighting and day to day life.

        I can honestly say I would be in seriously bad shape if not for this amazing woman.

Caroline Johnson.text: After having chemotherapy, I have had an on going problem with my toenails, particularly my big toe. I had seen several doctors and consultants as my toenail was 80% blackened and thick and looked to about to fall off, no diagnosis was made and I was left feeling quite down as a result. Meredith came to see me in regard to another issue, and I mentioned it in passing how my feet made me feel, she did no more, got her kit bag for foot therapy and within 10 minutes had removed this awful black substance that was under the nail, this what was making it discoloured and she filed the dead part of the nail that looked as if it might fall off smooth so in blended in with the rest of the healthy nail! It was that simple, after having test for fungus and all sorts to no avail for more than a year! Can‚Äôt thank her enough, she‚Äôs just bloody brilliant! Having my foot look normal again had made me feel so much better in myself! A great big thanks!

Gabriela Ojeda.text: The BEST massage I have ever had. Holistic approach. Will take care of the issue first hand. Professional and absolutely amazing. Cannot recommend her enough. ‚ù§Ô∏è
